.header-search__form-button .eds-btn{min-width:44px}.header-search__form-button .header-search__btn-content{position:relative;overflow:hidden;white-space:nowrap;max-width:0;-webkit-transition:all .8s ease;transition:all .8s ease;line-height:1rem;padding-right:0}.feed-events-bucket__content--loading{min-height:800px}
